sources.styles/core/variables.sass:
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Oswald:400,500|Source+Sans+Pro:400&display=swap')

// Color
$color-main: #E7CC84
$color-main--light: lighten($color-main, 10%)
$color-main--dark: darken($color-main, 10%)

$color-selection: $color-main
$scrollbar-color: $color-main

$color-header: $color-main
$color-body: #000
$color-border: rgba(182, 182, 182, 0.4)

// Type
$font-header: 'Oswald', sans-serif
$font-body: 'Source Sans Pro', sans-serif

// Animation
$transition1: 0.28s all ease
sources.styles/core/globals.sass:
*
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box
  box-sizing: border-box

html
  font-size: 62.5%

  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale

::selection
  color: #fff
  background: $color-selection

::-webkit-scrollbar
  width: 5px

  background: #f6f6f6

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb
  background-color: $scrollbar-color

// img reset
img
  max-width: 100%
  height: auto

// basic hr
hr,
.hr
  display: block

  height: 0.1rem
  margin: 0
  padding: 0

  border: 0
  background: $color-border

// wrapper
.wrapper
  max-width: 1000px
  margin: 0 auto
  padding: 30px

figure
  margin: 0

body
  margin: 0
  margin-bottom: 400px

.grid-vertical
  position: fixed
  right: 0
  left: 0

  display: flex
  justify-content: space-between

  width: calc(100% - 230px)
  height: 100vh
  margin: 0 auto

  .line-left
    width: 1px
    height: 100%

    opacity: 0.2
    background: #979797

  .line-right
    width: 1px
    height: 100%

    opacity: 0.2
    background: #979797

.cheeky
  width: 100vw
  margin: 150px 0

.overlay
  position: fixed
  z-index: 10
  top: 0
  left: 0

  width: 100vw
  height: 200vh

  transform: translateY(100%)

  background: #000

.overlay--light
  position: fixed
  z-index: 10
  top: 0
  left: 0

  width: 100vw
  height: 100vh

  transform: translateY(100%)

  background: rgba(#000, .3)
sources.styles/core/type.sass:
body
  color: $color-body

  font-family: $font-body
  font-size: 1.6rem
  font-weight: 400
  line-height: 1.6

h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6,
th
  display: inline-block

  margin: 0 0 0.3em 0

  text-transform: uppercase

  font-family: $font-header
  font-weight: 400
  line-height: 1.18

h1,
.h1
  font-size: 6.4rem

h2,
.h2
  font-size: 4.8rem

h3,
.h3
  font-size: 3.6rem

h4,
.h4
  font-size: 2.7rem

h5,
.h5
  font-size: 2.2rem

h6,
.h6
  font-size: 2rem

p,
.p
  max-width: 750px
  margin: 0 0 1em 0

  &:last-child
    margin-bottom: 0

a
  transition: $transition1
  text-decoration: none

  color: initial
sources.styles/components/header.sass:
header
  position: relative

  height: 1246px

.header-logo
  height: 50px
  margin-top: 35px
  margin-bottom: 0
  margin-left: 20px

.header-img
  position: absolute
  z-index: -1
  top: -6px
  right: 0
  left: 6%

  height: 1246px
  margin: 0 auto

.header__nav-bar
  position: relative
  z-index: -2

  display: flex
  align-items: center
  justify-content: space-between

  width: 80%
  margin-top: 40px
  margin-right: 30px
  margin-left: calc(20% - 30px)
  padding-top: 30px
  padding-bottom: 20px

  border-top: 1px solid #eee
  border-bottom: 1px solid #eee

  .header__meta
    display: flex

    .header__meta__group
      width: 76px
      margin-right: 40px

      h5
        display: block

        opacity: .5

        font-size: 11px

      h4
        font-size: 18px

.header__nav
  position: absolute
  // right: 40px
  right: 0

  img
    height: 60px

.header__count
  position: absolute
  top: 342px
  right: 83px

  text-align: right

  h4
    display: block

    margin-bottom: 0

    font-size: 20px
    font-weight: 500

  h5
    margin-top: -10px

    opacity: .05

    font-size: 75px
    font-weight: 500

.header__title-section
  position: absolute
  z-index: 1
  top: 50%
  left: 148px

  transform: rotate(-90deg) translateY(-50%)

  .header__title-section__inner
    display: flex
    flex-direction: column

    h3
      font-size: 20px

    h1
      margin: 0

      font-size: 80px

    p
      max-width: 265px
      margin-top: 5px

      text-transform: uppercase

      font-size: 14px
      line-height: 1.4

.header__desc
  position: absolute
  top: 729px
  right: 0

  padding-right: 129px
  padding-bottom: 20px

  border-bottom: 1px solid #eee

  h3
    font-size: 15px
    font-weight: 500

  p
    max-width: 261px

    font-size: 13px
sources.styles/components/slider.sass:
section.slide-section
  .slide-section__meta
    display: flex
    align-items: center
    flex-direction: column

    margin-top: 100px
    margin-bottom: 60px

    text-align: center

    h3
      display: inline-block

      opacity: .6

      font-size: 12px

    h2
      display: inline-block

      margin: 0

      font-size: 50px

    p
      display: inline-block

      margin-top: 7px

      text-align: center
      text-transform: uppercase

      opacity: .7

      font-size: 18px

.slider
  overflow: hidden

  .slider__inner
    display: flex

    width: 140%

    transform: translateX(117px)

.slide
  display: flex
  flex-direction: column

  margin-right: 61px

  img
    width: 358px
    height: 496px
    margin-bottom: 26px

  h4
    margin-top: 0

  p
    margin-top: 0
sources.styles/components/cheeky.sass:
.cheeky
  position: relative

  overflow: hidden

  width: 100vw
  height: 700px

.cheeky-desc
  position: absolute
  bottom: 140px
  left: 0px

  display: flex
  flex-direction: column

  transform: rotate(-90deg)

  h3
    color: #fff

    font-size: 20px

  h2
    margin-bottom: 10px

    color: #fff

    font-size: 63px

  p
    max-width: 294px
    margin-top: 0

    color: #fff

    font-size: 14px

.cheeky-button
  position: absolute
  top: 40px
  right: 40px

  h3
    display: flex
    align-items: center

    color: #fff

    font-size: 18px

    img
      margin-left: 10px

.sign
  position: absolute
  right: 51px
  bottom: 48px

.cheekyBeeky
  position: absolute
  z-index: -1
  right: 0
  left: 0

  width: 100vw
sources.styles/components/slideshow.sass:
.slideshow
  position: relative

  padding-left: 150px

.slideshow-desc
  padding-top: 83px
  padding-left: 30px

  h3
    max-width: 288px

    font-size: 35px

  p
    max-width: 288px

    font-size: 14px

.slideshow-small-image
  position: relative

  display: flex
  overflow: hidden

  width: 540px
  height: 364px
  margin-top: 102px

  img
    position: absolute

    width: 100%
    height: 100%

    &:nth-child(2)
      z-index: 3

    &:nth-child(3)
      z-index: 2

    &:nth-child(4)
      z-index: 1

.white
  position: absolute
  z-index: 10
  bottom: 0

  width: 540px
  height: 364px

  transform: translateX(100%)

  background: #fff

.white2
  position: absolute
  z-index: 10
  bottom: 0

  width: 653px
  height: 936px

  transform: translateX(100%)

  background: #fff

.slideshow-large-image
  position: absolute
  z-index: -1
  top: 0
  right: 206px

  display: flex
  overflow: hidden

  width: 653px
  height: 936px

  img
    position: absolute

    width: 100%
    height: 100%

    &:nth-child(2)
      z-index: 3

    &:nth-child(3)
      z-index: 2

    &:nth-child(4)
      z-index: 1

.pagination
  position: absolute
  right: 0
  bottom: 0

  display: flex
  align-items: center
  justify-content: center

  width: 206px
  height: 364px

  background: #2E404B

  .pagination__controls
    display: flex
    flex-direction: column

    .pagination__control
      width: 10px
      height: 10px
      margin-bottom: 20px

      cursor: pointer
      transition: .3s all ease

      opacity: .4
      border-radius: 50%
      background: #fff

      &:hover
        opacity: 1

      &:last-child
        margin-bottom: 0

    .pagination__control--active
      position: relative

      transition: .3s all ease

      opacity: 1

      &:after
        position: absolute
        top: 50%
        right: 0
        left: -7.7px

        width: 25px
        height: 25px
        margin: 0 auto

        content: ''
        transition: .3s all ease
        transform: translateY(-50%)

        opacity: .2
        border-radius: 50%
        background: #fff

        filter: blur(2px)
